scripts.debug: export INTERNAUTICA_ENV=debug && rm -rf public && DEBUG=Eleventy* npx eleventy --serve
scripts.start: export INTERNAUTICA_ENV=dev && rm -rf public && npx eleventy --serve --quiet
scripts.build: export INTERNAUTICA_ENV=deploy && rm -rf public && npx eleventy --quiet && echo -n size: && du -hs public
scripts.upload: npm run build && neocities push public && neocities list /
